post.title: Concert Twitch Overlay
post.description: An overlay that allows Twitch streamers to have an interactive audience that performs wotagei. User can customize when and how animations are triggers, and they can replace the audience members, lightsticks, and bits burst with their own images.
post.content:
If you are failing to connect to twitch after filling everything out, look at this:

On the twitch token page, double check that the following permissions are checked Yes (it randomly unchecks some):

  • bits:read
  • chat:read
  • channel:read:subscriptions
  • channel:read:redemptions
  • user:read:follows Having any of these settings unchecked will result in a Twitch Connection error

An overlay that allows Twitch streamers to have an interactive audience that performs wotagei. Users can customize when and how animations are triggers, and they can replace the audience members, lightsticks, and bits burst with their own images.

Any questions can be directed at me via twitter or put in the comments below.

[FREE STREAM ASSET]

Interactive audience overlay, great for concerts and karaoke! Only works with Twitch.

This is a totally customizable overlay that reacts to chat, redeems, bits, and subs. #VTuber #VSinger #VTuberAssets
‚Üì More info below ‚Üì pic.twitter.com/RPQ7Nx7iRa

— Lua Lucky üåüüê∂ @ 7M|C (@LuaVLucky) July 29, 2021
